statements: UPDATE datasource_unified_view SET data_source_1_column_1 = 'Value1', data_source_1_column_2 = 10, data_source_2_column_2 = 25.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE datasource_unified_view SET data_source_2_column_1 = 'Value2', data_source_1_column_2 = 20, data_source_2_column_2 = 50.3 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE datasource_unified_view SET data_source_1_column_1 = 'New Value 1', data_source_1_column_2 = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE datasource_unified_view SET data_source_2_column_1 = 'New Value 2', data_source_2_column_2 = 50.45 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE data_source_1 SET age = 30, name = 'John' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE data_source_2 SET salary = 50000.0, address = '123 Main St' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE data_source_1 SET name='John Doe', age=30 WHERE id=1;

UPDATE data_source1 SET age = age + 1, name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE data_source_1 SET age = 35, location = 'New York' WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE data_source_2 SET email = 'john.doe@example.com', phone_number = '555-1234' WHERE id = 201;
UPDATE data_source_1 SET age = 30, name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE data_source_2 SET phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE id = 201;
UPDATE data_source_1 SET name = 'Updated Name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE data_source_2 SET data_2 = 1000, timestamp = NOW() WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE data_source_1 SET name='Updated Name', data_1=100 WHERE id=1;
